summary:
Visa to send stablecoin USDC over Solana to help pay merchants in crypto - Visa said on Tuesday that it would begin to send USDC, the second-largest stablecoin by market capitalization, to select merchants via the Solana blockchain in a newly announced pilot.

 Messari's State of Solana Q3 2023 - Solana's transaction fees remain among the lowest in web3, reports Messari. See the latest overview of the Solana network by the numbers in this third-party review.
